definition: facial hair that has grown down the side of the face in front of the ears, especially when the rest of the beard is shaved off
details:
noun
- facial hair that has grown down the side of the face in front of the ears, especially when the rest of the beard is shaved off
= example: facial hair that has grown down the side of the face in front of the ears, especially when the rest of the beard is shaved off
= synonyms: sideburn
